com.defano.jmonet.model

Class FlexQuadrilateral

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.model.FlexQuadrilateral

  • public class FlexQuadrilateral
extends Object
    Models a four-sided, simple polygon (quadrilateral) with no restrictions on the length, angle or parallelness, except that the shape's edges do not cross each other (self-intersecting quadrilaterals are disallowed).
